effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks and abilities have a high chance to summon a scarab that retrieves a fortifying chunk of flesh from your target. Scarabs deal 10,957 Physical damage and reduce your damage taken by 50% until 273,850 damage has been prevented.
Use: Send your swarm into a frenzy, summoning 12 scarabs over 3 sec to ravage your foes. The number of scarabs is increased by your Haste. (1 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 68,183 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Transmogrified to:
Crest of the Seething Flamekeeper

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Horde Tabard
description: A fine tabard that provides no useful combat effects, but it will let everyone know you represent the Horde.
